alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 06 at 6:17PM MST until October 06 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 700 PM MST. * At 617 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Casa Grande, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Casa Grande and Stanfield. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 156 and 170. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 165. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
